scripts.build: mkdir build && cat src/version.js src/image.js src/sound.js src/param.js src/touch.js > build/pico.js && cp src/pico.html build/pico.html && cp src/*.css build && cp src/index.html build/index.html && cp src/daemon.js build && cp src/manifest.json build
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
